name: Project Starship (itch)
description:
PROJECT STARSHIP

PLAY WITH YOUR FRIENDS

Vote it on Steam:

http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/...

CHECK OUT on sound cloud "Forgotten Lords". Good stuff, two soundtracks of the game are of them :)
https://soundcloud.com/forgotten-lord


Bullet Hell ! Arcade ! Rogue ! KonamiCode!
Jump in the universe of Project Starship!

play with more than 30 bonuses!
CLASH over 19 Bosses in a game that is never the same!
28 minions to smash, 15 minibosses, mad events, a fully randomly generated (and auto balanced) arcade styled shooter.

featuring local multiplayer if you have an xbox controller.
support up to two xbox controller for both players.

STORY
Year 2305,
human activity on earth awakes Cthulhu from his depth sleep!
Human race is obligated to leave the earth!

200 Years later on the mother-ship,
two innovative prototypes of starships are built by humans!
2 heros, the destiny of humanity and earth in their hands!

It's time for the comeback!!!




CONTROLS

To RESET the game (o.O) you have to press CTRL+R in the title menu!

space - START button / ACTIVE OBJECT button
shift - B button / SLOW DOWN button
z - A button / SHOOTHEHELLOUTOFTHESHIP button
ESC to pause
arrow keys - move the starship

xbox controller

back (in game) - player 2 join game or while the game is paused select the "resume"/"menu" voice
start - START button / PAUSE button
PRESS left/right stick - ACTIVE OBJECT button
left/right trigger - B button / SLOW DOWN button
left/right bumper - A button / SHOOT button
left/right stick or d-pad - move the starship
